fullplot: While playing outside one day, nine-year-old Michele discovers Filippo, who is chained to the ground at the bottom of a hole. Michele witnesses town baddie Felice nearby and suspects something bad is happening. Michele is unsure whom he should tell about his discovery, eventually spilling the beans to his closest friend.
plot: A young boy accidentally discovers a deep hole in the ground, where another boy is kept prisoner.
title: I'm Not Scared

tomatoes.consensus: A well-acted and thrilling coming-of-age tale that captures a child awakening to the frightening world of adults.
